## Info

### Equipment
- Sony A7IV
- Sony 14mm f/1.8 GM
- iOptron SkyTracker Pro

### Settings
- RAW
- 14mm
- f/1.8
- 150-210s (Sky)
- 180-260s (FG)
- ISO 100-400

### Processing
- Adobe Photoshop
- Foreground + sky composite
- Star reduction
- Color + lighting rebalancing
